paper_abstract: This paper concerns the construction of quadrature rules based on the use of suitable refinable quasi-interpolatory operators, for the numerical evaluation of Hadamard finite-part integrals. Convergence analysis of the obtained rules is developed and numerical examples are included. (C) 2010 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Numerical evaluation of certain hypersingular integrals using refinable operators
